Class GameQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.DBadapter
      • database.DBimplementation
        • database.GameQuery

  • public class GameQuery
extends DBimplementation
    la classe GameQuery contiene i metodi usati per le query effettuate durante il gioco

    1.0
    Author:
    Andrea Peluso
